A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing movie\, basically the bad guys never succeed in anything they try to do\, so after the first scene or two you know how the movie goes. Kylo Ren is the only saving grace\, the actor behind him is pretty believable even if hobbled by the script\, was not impressed with the acting of most of the rest of the cast. This series has become a cash cow\, nothing else.
